title: A RESOLUTION APPROVING AND ADOPTING THE MUNICIPAL SCHOOL BOARD RESOLUTION NO. 2025-15 DATED AUGUST 27, 2025 ENTITLED, “RESOLUTION ADOPTING AND APPROVING THE RIZAL TABLETS FOR SCHOOLS OF THE FUTURE PROJECT OF THE HONORABLE PROVINCIAL GOVERNOR MIRASOL ”SOL” ARAGONES OF THE PROVINCE OF LAGUNA AND THE HONORABLE MUNICIPAL MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON OF THE MUNICIPALITY OF LOS BANOS”. Author
